module.name: Cron
module.author: Alain Bertrand
module.description: The daily cron system. Can be set to be run from the cron system of the server or embeded within the game (default setup).

key.name: embeddedCron
key.description: If set to yes, you don't need to run crons from the cron command, however it may slow down a bit your game.

key.name: lastCronRun
key.description: Do not touch, it will be set automatically by the cron module.
